note.p: Career: British Consul, Tripoli; Consul, Algiers (1766); MP for Inverness
References: Raymond Phineas Stearns, 'Fellows of the Royal Society in North Africa and the Levant, 1662-1800' in NR 1954-55 vol 11 pp 75-90
G E Fogg, 'The Royal Society and the Antarctic' in NR 2000 vol 54 pp 85-98
Notes: Election certificate reads "Ballotted for and Elected Jany 8 1777"
